00147 int nfs3_Pathconf( nfs_arg_t               * parg,    
00148                    exportlist_t            * pexport, 
00149                    fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00150                    cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00151                    hash_table_t            * ht,
00152                    struct svc_req          * preq,    
00153                    nfs_res_t               * pres )  
00154 { 
00155         static char   __attribute__(( __unused__ ))     funcName[] = "nfs3_Pathconf";
00156   
00157   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status ;
00158   cache_entry_t           * pentry = NULL ;
00159   cache_inode_fsal_data_t   fsal_data ;
00160   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr ;
00161   fsal_staticfsinfo_t       staticinfo ;
00162   fsal_dynamicfsinfo_t      dynamicinfo ;
00163 
00164   /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00165   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resfail.obj_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00166 
00167   /* Convert file handle into a fsal_handle */
00168   if( nfs3_FhandleToFSAL( &(parg->arg_access3.object), &fsal_data.handle, pcontext ) == 0 )
00169         return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00170 
00171   /* Set cookie to zero */
00172   fsal_data.cookie = DIR_START ;
00173 
00174   /* Get the entry in the cache_inode */
00175   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_get( &fsal_data, 
00176                                   &attr, 
00177                                   ht, 
00178                                   pclient, 
00179                                   pcontext, 
00180                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00181     {
00182       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00183       pres->res_pathconf3.status = NFS3ERR_STALE ;
00184       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00185     }
00186   
00187   /* Get the filesystem information */
00188   if( cache_inode_statfs( pentry, &staticinfo, &dynamicinfo, pcontext, &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00189     {
00190        pres->res_pathconf3.status = nfs3_Errno( cache_status ) ;
00191       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00192     }
00193     
00194   
00195   /* Build post op file attributes */
00196   nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00197                      pentry,
00198                      &attr,
00199                      &(pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) );
00200   
00201   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.linkmax          = staticinfo.maxlink ;
00202   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.name_max         = staticinfo.maxnamelen ;
00203   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.no_trunc         = staticinfo.no_trunc ;
00204   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.chown_restricted = staticinfo.chown_restricted ;
00205   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.case_insensitive = staticinfo.case_insensitive ;
00206   pres->res_pathconf3.PATHCONF3res_u.resok.case_preserving  = staticinfo.case_preserving ;
00207   
00208   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00209 } /* nfs3_Pathconf */
00210 
00219 void nfs3_Pathconf_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00220 {
00221   /* Nothing to do */
00222   return ;
00223 } /* nfs3_Pathconf_Free */
